testsuite.name: Quasar Fire Operation API Integration Tests

testcase.name: Should handle insufficient satellites in request
Should process complete TopSecret request end-to-end
Should return 404 when insufficient satellites for split processing
Should process complete TopSecretSplit workflow end-to-end
